Position Overview:

We are seeking an experienced IT Manager with a strong background in system administration to oversee our organization's IT infrastructure and operations. The ideal candidate will possess a blend of technical expertise, leadership skills, and strategic vision to effectively manage our IT resources and support our business objectives.

Responsibilities:

IT Infrastructure Management: - Oversee the design, implementation, and maintenance of our organization's IT infrastructure, including networks, servers, storage systems, and cloud services. - Ensure the security, availability, and performance of IT systems through proactive monitoring, maintenance, and optimization. - Plan and execute infrastructure upgrades, migrations, and expansion projects as needed to support business growth and technological advancements.

System Administration: - Lead a team of system administrators responsible for managing servers, databases, operating systems, and other IT systems. - Develop and enforce IT policies, procedures, and standards to ensure compliance, security, and efficiency. - Troubleshoot complex technical issues and provide escalated support to resolve critical incidents in a timely manner.

IT Operations: - Manage IT service desk operations and ensure timely resolution of user support requests and technical issues. - Coordinate with internal stakeholders and external vendors to procure, deploy, and maintain IT hardware, software, and services. - Implement ITIL best practices for incident, problem, change, and asset management to streamline IT operations and improve service delivery.

Team Leadership and Development: - Provide leadership, guidance, and mentorship to the IT team, fostering a culture of collaboration, innovation, and continuous learning. - Set clear performance goals and objectives for team members, conduct regular performance evaluations, and provide constructive feedback for professional growth. - Identify training and development opportunities to enhance the skills and capabilities of the IT team in alignment with organizational goals.

Strategic Planning: - Collaborate with senior management to develop IT strategies, roadmaps, and budgets aligned with business objectives and priorities. - Evaluate emerging technologies and industry trends to recommend innovative solutions that drive operational excellence and competitive advantage. - Participate in IT governance processes to ensure alignment between IT investments and business strategy, risk management, and regulatory compliance.

Software Experience: - ERP / SAP Implementation & Management - E-Commerce Management (Magento / Shopify) - CCTV Security / Surveillance system management - Time Attendance & related management - Building Management System.

Preferred Skills

  • IT Infrastructure Management
  • System Administration
  • IT Operations
  • Team Leadership and Development
  • Strategic Planning
  • Software Management.
